text:
Cleveland “Fly As Day” Jones also known as Fly As Day (born June 22, 1983) is an American Entrepreneur, Sports Agent and founder of Fly As Day™️ Management specializing in professional sports and entertainment. He is the client manager of JR Sports Enterprises, a sports agency based in Albany, New York, that represents roughly 75 professional athletes, entertainers, personalities and performers. Jones represents athletes and celebrities, both active John Rickert, Christina Hammer, Kenneth Durden, Anthony Cioffi, Travell Mazion, [http://r.search.yahoo.com/_ylt=Awr9IlajnqpbBA8AWxFXNyoA;_ylu=X3oDMTEybWFocjVwBGNvbG8DZ3ExBHBvcwMxBHZ0aWQDQjYwNTdfMQRzZWMDc3I-/RV=2/RE=1537937188/RO=10/RU=http%3a%2f%2fwild-n-out.wikia.com%2fwiki%2fRoyce_Bell/RK=2/RS=6CKppmZXjhwEJ4txzeLNpRNwsvI- Royce Bell] and of the retired Gold & Platinum Grammy Award Winning Recording Engineer Glen Kolotkin.
Early Life and Education.
Born in Houma, Louisiana on June 22 1983, Jones completed a Bachelor's degree in Media and Entertainment Business from Full Sail University in 2005.
Career.
Jones first embedded his entertainment roots in the foundation of client Management, business intelligence, negotiations & mentorship, Serving as Agetare U.S. handler an agent of 5 Time WBC & WBO World Champion Christina Hammer and Manager of Golden Boy Promotions prospect Travell “Black Magic” Mazion.Since then, Fly as Day has been the manager to various pro athletes including Kenneth Durden of the Tennessee Titans,Anthony Cioffi of the Ottawa Redblacks and Royce Bell of MTV's Nick Cannon Wild 'n Out.
In 2014, Jones founded Fly As Day Management, a company that markets and promotes professional athletes, entertainers and brands on Social media. In an interview with HuffPost, Jones revealed that during the initial years of his company he used MySpace to promote & manage profiles whereas now his operations are held on Facebook,Instagram and Twitter. Jones is known for his motivational quotes through which he constantly motivates his clients. Joel Bushby, one of Jones' clients founded his own company TNT Fuel Supplements after getting motivated from Cleveland.
Jones also operated as head of influencer marketing at [https://www.cultureaudio.com/ Culture Audio] - A company that makes headphones.
